text: @realDonaldTrump MAGA AMERICA = where's it's easier to get an AR-15 than a COVID-19 test kit...where you have an ignorant, science denying POTUS who actually stared into the sun to once and for all prove his sheer ignorance...where the POTUS can use the WH as his own personal cash register...
